title: Building a better data solution: Microsoft SQL Server and Azure Data Services
body: Moving to the cloud in a big way? In this case study, learn about building a complex end-to-end infrastructure involving SQL Server (on-premises), Microsoft Azure SQL Data Warehouse, and Azure SQL Database. Gain an understanding of how to use Azure Automation to reduce your costs and automate processes. Learn about integration with Azure Active Directory, virtual networks, and data flows.
speaker: Joseph Dantoni
